title: Account issue
body: My account has been permanently banned and I have no idea why. I rarely chat in games so it has nothing to do with being toxic. I submitted a couple of tickets two weeks ago and still have heard nothing. The email that the account was created with is no longer used.

replies.body: When I took a look over this account, it looks like the ban was placed due to some heavily suspicious activity that could have been related to a hacker. Hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll be able to go over everything once you're verified as the account creator.

Were you really permanently banned or are you just unable to log in? I made the same assumption, but if you received a notification saying that you were banned and you are unsure why then the only solution really is to submit another ticket. It's possible Riot could've missed you, please re-submit a ticket.

After this ticket and you have still have not gotten reply there isn't much you can do. You could re-submit a ticket again or get a new account and get on the rift. You could try to get in contact with someone on the board who works for Riot, if you find a discussion where a Riot worker has replied you can ask them.
